_sText:
Aim Levelcore is a remake of the Aim Challenge map from the Counter-Strike: Global Offensive game.

Find out how fast you can aim compared to professional players, or your friends on this custom course!

Use all your skills to set down the fastest time!

---

- The map is intended solely for internal use.

- Run the map on your local server.

- Don't turn on bots.

---

You can use the bind key to quickly restart the game.

To do this, enter the command in the game console:

bind "your_key" "mp_restartgame 1"

To restart the game early, push on the fire extinguisher.

To restart the game after completing the mission, click on the keyboard that lies on the control table.

You can use the color-coded stopwatch indicators located on the fire extinguishers:

00:00.000 - 00:30.000 | yellow light

00:30.000 - 00:40.000 | blue light

00:40.000 - 01:05.000 | green light 

01:05.000 - 10:00.000 | red ligth
